headline: BD Board Declares Dividend, Authorizes 10 Million Additional Share Repurchases; BD Completed $750 Million Repurchase to Date in FY25
summary: FRANKLIN LAKES, N.J., Jan. 28, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- The Board of Directors of BD , a leading global medical technology company, today announced it has declared a quarterly dividend of $1.04 per...
